message: Mohamed Alaa Hey my UI/UX go to guy :) do you recommend multi column drop down menu to replace the ones in this home page www.vezeeta.com ?

data.message: in which part of the page is the menu?

In the middle under Book appointment for free (the two location and specialty drop down/combo).

I need to open each one and instead of list, i want 2 or three columns containing the items so the user won't have to scroll.

Well if i would you I would display map with the person location marked on the map and the doctors listings are marked in the map by default. then below I would add this  combo in a search box example: http://d.pr/i/F5R8
